events.text:
Hm...[nw]

There isn't much to say right now...We're on a hill, which is a type of slope. And slopes are a type of terrain you can find in this game.

You will also come across what I like to call "natural stairs". You will have to jump in order to get on top of those.

And that's all I could come up with...Sorry.

This was a short one, so let me make it up to you by providing a longer one!
